scripts.build:plugin-cron: npm run await:core && npm run build --workspace @wocker/cron-plugin

scripts.watch:plugin-mail: npm run await:core && npm run watch --workspace @wocker/mail-plugin

scripts.watch:plugin-redis: npm run await:core && npm run watch --workspace @wocker/redis-plugin
